body.name: 20 Pcs Black Silverware Set, Stainless Steel Flatware Set for 4, Food-Grade Cutlery Set, Mirror Polished Tableware Eating Utensils Set for Home Kitchen, Include Knife Fork Spoon Set, Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 45 mins
features: ✅【20 PIECES BLACK SILVERWARE SET FOR 4】: This flatware set contains 4 dinner knives, 4 dinner forks, 4 salad forks, 4 dinner spoons and 4 dessert spoons. Great for home, restaurant, hotel, buffet, gathering, wedding, camping, party and entertaining. If you are going to have a picnic or a party , then this set of tableware can not only meet your requirements, but also make your dinner full of design.

✅【HIGH QUALITY AND DURABLE】: This silverware set is made of FOOD GRADE stainless steel which is very durable, corrosion resistant, rust-proof, non-toxic, BPA free, no metal aftertaste. Meanwhile, its sturdiness ensures that it will not bend easily providing you with long - term use.

✅【UNIQUE BLACK LOOK】: The mysterious black appearance stands out from ordinary silverware, making it look more retro and vintage, just like a noble flatware used in the manor, smooth surface and fine workmanship make it more luxurious and create an elegant, noble and luxurious dining atmosphere. There is no need to worry about fading or cracking, as this is a metal layer from vacuum plating technology. If you want to be different in tableware, you won’t miss it.

✅【PROPER WEIGHT AND ERGONOMIC HANDLE】: Unlike other brands, the curvature of our utensil handles is designed according to the posture of the hand, and the appropriate weight and perfect balance are added to ensure maximum comfort during use that avoids you feel tired. Moreover, the smooth edges ensure safety and no scratches.

✅【USE AND CARE】: It is recommended to wash by hand, wipe dry before storing. Do not use wire brushes, hard sponges or clean cloths and other hard materials cleaning tools to avoid damage the silverware.

✅【EXCELLENT SERVICE】: We have a very efficient after-sales service team, If you have any questions about our black silverware set, Please feel free to contact us, We will try our best to give you a satisfactory answer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our black silverware set is made of high quality food grade stainless steel that ensures safety and durability. They are rust-resistant, sturdy structure and durable for daily use. With simple and elegant design, it's ideal for family daily use, parties, gatherings, family dinners, candlelight dinner, banquet, Thanksgiving, BBQ, wedding and other formal occasions. Using Instruction: 1.Recommend hand washing for longer term use. 2.Please do not use wire brushes or hard sponges to prevent scratches, keep the silverware smooth. 3.Use mild cleaner when cleaning, taking special care not to soak for long periods as soaking can permanently damage silverware. 4.After cleaning, dry with soft towel and keep them in a dry place.

These tableware have proper thickness and uniform weight distribution, so that it has a good balance, which makes it more comfortable to use and not easy to feel fatigued. Also suitable for teenagers and young people. Black makes it looks more retro, creating an elegant, noble and luxurious dining atmosphere, elevating everyday meals into a fine dining experience. The curvature of our tableware handle is designed according to the posture of the hand, which makes it more comfortable to hold and will not feel tired after long-term use. The smooth edges ensure safety and no scratches.

WISKEMA has been engaged in the design, production and sales of Kitchen & Dining products for many years, committed to producing high-quality and durable products. We are very proud to make our tools available to any home cook and hope to give them the joy of using quality utensils loved by professionals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the modern look. Great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice set with nice price
reviews.reviewText: These are great. Have washed well. Dish washer sturdy. My kids had somehow lost all silverware in the house and this was a great replacement set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: OBSESSED IS AN UNDERSTATEMENT! I’m going to order more, I love them so much. well packaged and so gorgeous. not heavy at all & just perfect. Comes with 2 sizes of everything not the the knifes but it’s a bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Came more glossy and not matte, however durable and lightweight silverware. They do scratch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have fibromyalgia and these are great so far. Balanced, light weight yet sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for one with weakness
reviews.reviewText: Finding silverware has always been hard because of the weight of certain sturdy silverware. I tremble a lot and have motor issues at times. Fibromyalgia makes it hard for weights. These are one of the first I can actually use without issue. They are strong and lightweight! Can handle icecream and frozen fruits with ease while being easy enough to manipulate through meals. I recommend these for anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They rusted almost immediately
reviews.reviewText: I've had these for a bit over a few months now and I only have 2 forks left that arent covered in rust. Do not buy these.

reviews.reviewerName: No, ma'am/sir half of them was broke
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
